TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OnlineGradientDescentTrainer extends Microsoft.ML.Trainers.Online.AveragedLinearTrainer`2<class Microsoft.ML.Data.RegressionPredictionTransformer`1<class Microsoft.ML.Learners.LinearRegressionModelParameters>, class Microsoft.ML.Learners.LinearRegressionModelParameters>
Public NotInheritable Class OnlineGradientDescentTrainer Inherits AveragedLinearTrainer(Of RegressionPredictionTransformer(Of LinearRegressionModelParameters), LinearRegressionModelParameters)

Docs.summary: Stochastic gradient descent is an optimization method used to train a wide range of models in machine learning. In the ML.Net the implementation of OGD, is for linear regression.
Docs.remarks: Stochastic gradient descent uses a simple yet efficient iterative technique to fit model coefficients using error gradients for convex loss functions. The OnlineGradientDescentRegressor implements the standard (non-batch) SGD, with a choice of loss functions, and an option to update the weight vector using the average of the vectors seen over time (averaged argument is set to True by default).
